title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With...' followed by the 'Default Text Editor' option, nothing happens. The scripted resource editor example remains active despite selecting a different editor type.
EB: When selecting 'Open With...' and choosing the 'Default Text Editor' option, a new editor should be opened on the selected file, regardless of the type of editor currently active.
SR:
Reproduce the issue using the following steps:

1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. By default, the XML file will be opened using the scripted resource editor example.
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml' file.
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'
6. From the options, select 'Default Text Editor'.
7. Verify that a new editor opens for the file, indicating a different editor type is being used.

NOTES: Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types.
